item.name: leather armor
item.description: Tough leather that covers most of the body.Offer light but decent protection.

item.name: breastplate
item.description: Metal body that covers the torso, with vambraces and braces along the limbs. Offers much better protection.

item.name: fullplate
item.description: Strong metal that covers the whole body. Offering maximum protection. Very bulky.

item.name: dagger
item.description: A short blade of around 6-8 inches. Excellent as a last line weapon, or sneak by others.

item.name: longsword
item.description: A blade of around 3 feet. Most common weapon for adventure types.

item.name: hunters bow
item.description: A weapon with decent range and damage.
